originalText.text: I took my car here for a front and rear brake replacement and was offered fast, quality care. The price they offered was competitive compared with other dealers, and Mohammed was very responsive me with while completing the replacement.

originalText.text:
This is an exceptional business. You can trust Chris and his staff to  professional and QUALITY service. Oh and his partner/WIFE, run one the best auto repair shops in New York.  They are RELIABLE.... oh & if your  ice,you might get to enjoy one of her delicious meals.

originalText.text: Chris is the BEST! Really nice person. Stands by his work.

originalText.text: They are great with foreign vehicles.  However, it can get expensive.

text.text: They are great with foreign vehicles.  However, it can get expensive.

originalText.text: SCAMMERS !! there is a mechanic there by the name of Mohammed ! I took my car there to see what was wrong .. my mistake was not checking other mechanics to compare  . He told me my sterling column needed fixing it (allegedly ). As a female I know nothing about cars , he gave me a price about $800 and told me my car would be done in 3 hours .every hour I called he would say another hour , another hour ,  Which ended up being 10 hours later ! Once I got there he told me I needed another part & that he would get it so call him tomorrow.. I texted and called this man for 4 days & he IGNORED ME . He’s lucky I didn’t just pop up at his shop … another mistake I did was paying cash and not getting a receipt. After that I took my car to a mechanic closer to my home who then told me whatever Mohammed did wasn’t even fixed ! I basically got swindled out of my money . Thank you Mohammed smh …
